appetizers.name: Bacon & Cheese Dip
appetizers.author: Jackie Boatman
directions: Combine cream cheese, Colby jack cheese, half and half, mustard, onion, Worcestershire sauce, salt and hot pepper sauce in slow cooker.
Cover and cook, stirring occasionally on low 1 hour or until cheese melts.
Stir in bacon and serve with crusty bread or vegetable dippers.

appetizers.name: Shredded Buffalo Chicken
appetizers.author: Matt Boatman
directions: Put the chicken and the buffalo sauce in the crock pot and cook on low for 8 hours.
Remove the chicken from the crock pot and shred it, using two forks.
Add the shredded chicken back to the crock pot, add the ranch mix and the butter, and stir until the butter is melted and ingredients are well-mixed.

appetizers.name: Buffalo Chicken Dip
appetizers.author: Matt Boatman
directions: Combine all ingredients and a crock pot and mix well
Warm until homogeneous
Season to desired spice level with cayenne to make spicier, or more cream cheese to make less spicy
Serve with nachos, celery, or carrots

appetizers.name: Bacon Wrapped Water Chestnuts
appetizers.author: Jackie Boatman
directions: Wrap bacon around water chestnuts and secure with a toothpick.
Bake at 350o until bacon is done.
Drain grease off and dip in sauce.
Put back in oven to warm.

mainDishes.name: Baked Ziti
mainDishes.author: Christine Daugherty
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees Bring large pot of water to boil (lightly salted).
Add pasta and cook according to directions (al dente).
Place sausage in deep skillet, cook until brown, drain.
In large sauce pan heat sauce with 1 tsp basil until bubbling.

In medium bowl, mix ricotta 1 tsp Italian seasoning salt and pepper Spread bottom of 9x13 pan with sauce, layer 1⁄2 of ziti, 1⁄2 sausage, 1⁄2 of ricotta, 1⁄2 of mozzarella, sauce. Repeat Sprinkle top with 1⁄2 tsp basil, 1⁄2 tsp Italian seasoning, extra cheese Bake for 40-45 minutes

mainDishes.name: Lasagna
mainDishes.author: Mary Shaffner
directions: Cook noodles as directed
Preheat oven to 350
Mix ricotta, eggs, salt, pepper and parsley
Spoon thin layer of sauce in bottom of 13 x 9 pan, then layer of noodles, ricotta mixture, then mozzarella and Parmesan
Repeat layers , usually 3 layers
Top with sauce, provolone cheese
Bake covered for 45 minutes, uncover and bake for 15-20 minutes longer. Let stand for 20-30 minutes before cutting.
